word:
Counsel to a Newly Wedded Pair.--My Dear Brother and Sister: You have united in a lifelong 
                                                                           103
covenant. Your education in married life has begun. The first year of married life is a year of experience, a year in which husband and wife learn each other's different traits of character, as a child learns lessons in school. In this, the first year of your married life, let there be no chapters that will mar your future happiness. . . .
